attributes.title: Not worth your time and energy
attributes.review: I’m not sure if this is a beta / test mode but the quality of this app is pretty poor. Everything from graphics to actual content seems pretty subpar. Was hoping to learn a little bit about the platform and potential change he would present for the next four years and found nothing insightful.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: Terrible app! Hard to navigate, keep crashing, using your location, and stealing your data!! He lost my vote.

attributes.title: this app is a no🙈✨🌺
attributes.review: trump is a disgusting human being. instead of banning tiktok, let’s ban trump. gen z is ELITE and you’ll never stop us😌😌

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER MADE!!!!!!!!!!!
attributes.review: I was so excited to download this app so I could support the clown in office.  Unfortunately it gave my phone a virus that made me a liberal.  Now I am a Bernie supporter who is going to settle for Biden.  If you don’t want your mind to be hacked and made liberal, DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.title: crashes
attributes.review: i got this app to support our president 🇺🇸 but it crashed, just like the trump administration will crash and fall this election. to support this man and his ideas is to support the continued oppression of black people in america. to support him is to support racism, misogyny, homophobia, fascism, and so much more. black lives matter, and we need to address the inequalities institutionalized in our country, but we cannot do that while this man is still in office.

attributes.title: ARREST BREONNA TAYLORS MURDERS🗣🗣
attributes.review: Terrible app, it kept making my phone crash and was just a waste of storage👎🏾

attributes.title: Why
attributes.review: Don’t ban tiktok just because we hurt your feelings
